subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The beauty of sports is that you can’t script happy endings; you have to earn them. Michigan and Ohio State proved once again that they have a rivalry for the ages. But don’t play it again.
snippet: The beauty of sports is that you can’t script happy endings; you have to earn them. Michigan and Ohio State proved once again that they have a rivalry for the ages. But don’t play it again.
